artist: Pietro D'Asaro (called il Monocolo di Racalmuto); Formerly attributed to Pietro Novelli (called il Monrealese)
medium: Pen and brown ink, pen and brown ink and wash, on ivory laid paper
provenance: [Yvonne Tan Bunzl, London]; [?Adolphe Stein, London]; [Bury Street Gallery, London, in 1981, as by Pietro Novelli]; sale, Christie's, London, July 5, 1988, as by Novelli, for £1, 100, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1988-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: The Last Supper (recto); Adoration of the Shepherds (verso)
